description:
The Alliance heads out to stop Nirvana, even though they are bruised and battered to the point of barely being able to stand...  Natsu uses his nose to pick the lacrima where the strongest enemy awaits him, Master Zero! Zero and Natsu are both rarin` for a fight, but Natsu has reached the limits of his magic power, and he`s in serious trouble. But then Jellal shows up, even though he should have headed to a different lacrima, and attacks Natsu with magic. Has Jellal fallen to the darkness yet again? What will Natsu do when his back`s against the wall?
Source: crunchyroll
